name: Upward (GrantJam)
description:
A submission for the 2018 Chillennium Game Jam.

Transform the world around you with the click of a button, and work your way to the top.

Credits

Made by Chill Out 3

Programming by James Grant

Art and Design by Zach Thoms

Music - 

"Northern Glade" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Spaceship Models -

https://emerald-eel-entertainment.itch.io/low-poly-spaceship-asset-pack-001

Various assets in the public domain
